'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a female [orlan](/orlan/), and a recruitable [sidekick](/companionsDeadfireSidekicks/) in {{poe2}}.  

## Background

Mirke is a pirate working under [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/) of the Principi, and a famous connoisseur of all things alcoholic.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|rest            =

|other           =

}}

## =Quests

=
* [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/): She can help you in one of the two non-violent paths of this quest.  As long as she alive after completing this quest, she will join you as a companion.

##  Trivia 

* Mirke wears a unique version of the [Vailian Tricorn](/vailianTricorn/), which uses a different in-game model.

##  Behind the scenes 

* Mirke was not available as a sidekick during the release of {{poe2}}. She became available after the free [Rum Runner's Pack](/rumRunnersPack/) DLC.
* Removing Mirke's armor at first made her go fully nude unlike other companions who will remain in their underwear. This was patched in the latest release.
